summary: Most requested frontend/backend changes appear implemented: Sign Up flow (modal + backend persistence + migration), horizontal tab transitions with reduced-motion support, INR currency icon/text updates in several places, Send Parcel travel-mode removal with default mode, Profile photo local upload/preview, Offer Trip tab presence, and branding text updates. One requirement (REQ-35 asset addition) is not evidenced in the diff summary. Additionally, the bottom tab bar was altered to only 5 tabs, which was not requested and conflicts with the stated non-goal about not changing the overall tab architecture beyond adding Offer Trip.

missing_requirements.requirement: Add a new generated hero phone image asset under frontend/public/assets/generated with on-screen text "Pacel Wala" and use it wherever the current phone photograph is used (without renaming/removing other generated image filenames).
missing_requirements.reason: HomePage was updated to reference /assets/generated/home-hero-photo-pacel-wala.dim_1200x600.jpg, but the diff summary does not show any new image file added under frontend/public/assets/generated, so the asset addition portion of the requirement is not evidenced.
evidence: ADDED FILES list does not include any frontend/public/assets/generated/* image

hallucinated_features.description: Bottom tab navigation was reduced/changed to only five tabs (Home, Browse, Offer Trip, Track, Profile), removing other existing sections (e.g., Send, Chat, Notifications, Earnings, etc.) from the tab bar.
hallucinated_features.reason: The BuildRequest explicitly states a non-goal of changing the overall tab information architecture beyond adding Offer Trip to the bottom tab bar. The diff shows a significant restructuring of the bottom tabs beyond just adding Offer Trip.
evidence: frontend/src/components/MobileTabs.tsx (tabs array contains only home, browse, offer, track, profile)
